### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#17577](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17577.html) (refactor: deduplicate the message sign/veri

I think we do without the _utils suffix. No strong opinion, though.
I used the suffix because we already have `wallet.h` twice. No strong opinion either though, so I am happy to change it after the CIs are through.

Yeah, we use the include guards e.g. `BITCOIN_TEST_UTIL_WALLET_UTILS_H` to protect against duplicate includes and the `<>` import to protect against including the wrong path. So it should be fine to have three `wallet.h`\n\nThe travis CI passed and the appveyor ci is failing on master currently, so no need to wait for that.
Ok, I renamed and rebased.\nAs to move-only, note that I removed one include from `util.cpp` (validationinterface) that I could not allocate to any of the helper functions.
